data.title: Harold Lloyd's Wife Has Died
data.text:
October 07, 2005 | People

Harold Lloyds wife Marcelle Lloyd died last Saturday on October 1. Harold Lloyds is Elvis' cousin, long time security guard at Graceland and co-author of the book "The Gates of Graceland".

Graveside funeral services are tomorrow at 2:30pm Old Union Cemetary in Tueplo. The family is struggling financially if anyone would like to send a donation please contact:

Pegues Funeral Home

535 Jefferson St

Tupelo Mississippi 38804

Phone: (662) 842-4872

Source:Elvis Unlimited

cathyreno wrote on October 10, 2005

excuse me The family is struggling financially why is that? Isnt Lisa or Priscilla not helping them out? If Elvis was still alive they would be taking care of. If you're reading this Lisa Priscilla charity begins at home first. Look after family... Rest in peace T C B everyone
